items.sentence: I know for sure Tom moved to Boston a year ago.
Why didn't Tom tell us he was going to be late?
Can you tell me how you found out Tom did that?
Tom is out of surgery and seems to be doing OK.
I hope that Tom doesn't start doing that again.
Tom came back from the fair with a stomachache.
Tom came home from vacation with a nice suntan.
Tom said it isn't the first time that happened.
Tom is the only one who wasn't at Mary's party.
You might think that, but that's not how it is.
